Tapfuma Gutsa (a mụrụ n'afọ 1956) bụ onye Zimbabwe na-akpụ ihe.

Gutsa bụ nwa afọ Harare, ya na Cornelius Manguma gụrụ maka ihe ọkpụkpụ na Driefontein Mission School, o mechara bụrụ onye Zimbabwe mbụ natara onyinye British Council.  Mmụta ahụ nyere ya ohere ịmụ na London site na 1982 ruo 1985, ebe ọ natara diplọma na ihe ọkpụkpụ site na City and Guilds of London School of Art.

Gutsa bụ onye na-eme ihe a na-adịghị ahụkebe n'etiti ndị na-akpụ nkume na Zimbabwe maka obosara nke ihe ndị ọ na-eji arụ ọrụ ya; ihe ọkpụkpụ ya gụnyere ígwè, akwụkwọ, osisi, na ihe ndị ọzọ si mba ọzọ. Ihe ọkpụkpụ ya meriri na ngosi Nedlaw, 1987, gụnyere ahịhịa na-enwu ọkụ na-ekpuchi nnụnụ osisi.  Ọ bụ nwa nwanne nna Dominic Benhura, onye ya na ya gụrụ akwụkwọ; ọ bụkwa onye ndụmọdụ nye ọtụtụ ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe gụnyere Fabian Madamombe

N'afọ 2007, Gutsa bụ otu n'ime ndị na-ese ihe iri na otu nke mba ụwa e nyere ikike site n'aka Victoria na Albert Museum, London, nyere ọrụ iji mepụta ọrụ maka ihe ngosi akpọrọ 'Uncomfortable Truths: The Shadow of Slave Trading on Contemporary Art'.
